effect.extraalchemy.crumbling.descriptio: Erodes mundane materials from under the entity.
effect.extraalchemy.detection.descriptio: Allows you to see entities nearby.
effect.extraalchemy.combustion.descripti: Makes the entity set nearby blocks on fire and smelt items in their hands.
effect.extraalchemy.fuse.description: Creates an explosion around the creature when depleted.
effect.extraalchemy.gravity.description: Increases the gravity force that pulls the creature down.
effect.extraalchemy.learning.description: Increases XP orbs' value, pickup frequency and value.
effect.extraalchemy.pacifism.description: Applies slowing effect on any attacker.
effect.extraalchemy.piper.description: Makes animals attracted to you, making them follow you.
effect.extraalchemy.photosynthesis.descr: Provides food through the sun, but without saturation.
effect.extraalchemy.sails.description: Makes boat travel faster in water.
effect.extraalchemy.returning.descriptio: Teleports you near your bed or respawn anchor.
effect.extraalchemy.recall.description: At depletion teleports the entity back to where the effect was applied.
